Posts.Content:
I just had a biopsy yeaterday. Thou I wasnt expecting it. I was sent in for aspration of some cysts. my doc was not to concerned for they moved freely. After the ultrasound i was sent into the room to have the cysts drained, then the tech told they wanted to do a biopsy. I freaked out and started crying, then the tec she said something about
 1%. Try to assure me not to worry...YEA RIGHT...
Posts.Title: Breast Biopsy

Posts.Content: It was fluid, and the cysts moved very freely...apparently there was something under the one cyst that looked concerning. That one moved very freely too.
Posts.Title: Breast Biopsy
